full_description:
Wavefun Flex Pro Wireless Bluetooth Neckband Earphone

The Wavefun Flex Pro features Bluetooth 5.0 with CVC 6.0 Noise Cancelling technology to deliver true pure bass audio. It is equipped with a QCC3003 processor. It comes with magnetic Suction, when not worn, magnetic earplugs can prevent headphones from tangled, easy to carry. It has IPX5 Sweat-resistant Nano Coating that ensures flawless performance in the Rain and Sweat. The Flexible neckband is easily compact with your neck, it is super light, especially suitable for sports. It delivers Crystal Clear & Surround Sound. Wherever you go, whatever you do, just keep enjoying the pure, clear music anytime and anywhere. It has a battery capacity per pcs 120mAh. and can deliver music /talking time for Up to 9 hours. The Wavefun Flex Pro has no warranty.

full_description:
Wavefun Flex U Bluetooth Neckband Earphone

The Wavefun Flex U Bluetooth Neckband Earphone features Dual Dynamic Driver. The weight of the headphones is transferred to the shoulders by this Flexible neckband, making the ears lighter and more pleasant to wear. Dual Dynamic Drivers are included with the Wavefun Flex U. It boasts Dual 8mm Graphene Speakers and Bluetooth 5.0 to produce ultra-accurate HD sound with strong bass. The Flex U provides up to 10 hours of listening time each charge, allowing you to keep listening to your music. Significant component debugging adds advanced audio upgrades and noise suppression to the near and far end, resulting in the highest call quality possible. This neckband's IPX5 Sweat-Resistant Nano Coating Ensures Perfect Performance in the Rain and Sweat. The Wavefun Flex U Bluetooth Neckband Earphone comes with no warranty.
